attributes.action: Make it illegal for schools to not allow students to go to bathroom in lessons
attributes.additional_details:
Make it illegal for students to not be able to use toilets during lessons as it is against human rights.
Also it’s can cause students discomfort and illness.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how your school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with your school or parents.
